alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Cambria; Clearfield; Franklin; Fulton; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF BEDFORD...FULTON... CLEARFIELD...FRANKLIN...BLAIR...CAMBRIA...AND HUNTINGDON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to around one quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 811 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Punxsutawney to 15 miles north of Breezewood to near Greenwood and moving east at 25 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Dudley, Coaldale and Shy Beaver around 815 PM EDT. Waterfall around 835 PM EDT. Rockhill Furnace around 850 PM EDT. Willow Hill and Fannettsburg around 905 PM EDT. Blandburg around 910 PM EDT. Tyrone, Roxbury and Doylesburg around 915 PM EDT. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 between mile markers 147 and 155, and from mile markers 164 to 170. The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 162 to 201. Interstate 81 from mile markers 0 to 23. Interstate 99 from mile markers 24 to 49. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may be encountered. &&

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Blair; Cambria; Clearfield; Franklin; Fulton; Huntingdon
